name: Dwarves and Dragons
description:
ABANDON HOPE ALL YE WHO ENTER HERE, THAR BE DRAGONS!!

well, Draconians to be precise. That's the Dwarvish word for them anyway.  See how many Draconians you can keep alive at once.  Be cautious with how you feed them though.  As the right combination of food will help keep them alive.  The wrong combination of food will make them sick. Hurry to make them better before they die!

** CONTROLS * * CONTROLS * * CONTROLS * * CONTROLS * *

Move:  Use W,A,S,D or arrow keys

Interact: Use Alt (either one)

Cancel: Use Ctrl (either one)

Dragon Health Tips:

    - 3 gems = sick  (To fix, eat a fruit)

    - Limestone with no gems = sick (To fix, eat 2 gems)

    - 3 fruit = sick (To fix, eat a gem)

    - For proper feeding, please talk to the Dwarves

** CONTROLS * * CONTROLS * * CONTROLS * * CONTROLS * 

Welcome to version 0.003!

Features:

** Sound added for various actions!

** Various bug fixes and optimizations

Known Issues:

** Once full, a draconian is no longer angry when you pick him up.

**Swallowing sound will happen when the draconian naturally digests, sometimes causing it to fire seemingly randomly.
